TEXT.English: Bandits spawn most commonly in deserts, and are strong outside of cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Los bandidos son encontrados más frecuentemente en zonas desérticas, y son más fuertes fuera de las ciudades.

TEXT.English: Bandit Lords spawn in outlying lands, mostly in deserts, leading a group of [LINK=UNIT_BANDIT]Bandits[\LINK].
TEXT.Spanish: Los Señores Bandidos aparecen en zonas periféricas (principalmente desérticas), y comandan un grupo de [LINK=UNIT_BANDIT]Bandidos[\LINK].

TEXT.English: Cave Bears are strong bears spawning in the remote wilderness.
TEXT.Spanish: Los Osos Cavernarios son una fuerte subespecie que aparece en las zonas salvajes remotas.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The Dybbuk are malicious spirits that can control the soul of someone who recently died. They have little power over the just, though those burdened with sin are easy prey for them. The Dybbuk can force the soul to possess a living or dead host.[NEWLINE][TAB]When a Dybbuk leaves a corrupted soul in the body of a dead host it becomes a ghoul.
Ghouls spawn from [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_BARROW]Barrows[\LINK] in Marshes, and when a [LINK=UNIT_WIGHT]Wight[\LINK] defeats a living unit.
TEXT.Spanish: Los Ghouls aparecen en [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_BARROW]Túmulos[\LINK], en zonas pantanosas y cuando un [LINK=UNIT_WIGHT]Wight[\LINK] derrota a una unidad viva.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Hollow men are the ghosts of those who served Mulcarn in the Age of Ice. They are most common around Letum Frigus and typically appear and thin, pale, indefinite creatures that are nearly invisible in a snowstorm. They rarely attack formidable opponents, preferring to find those freezing in the wastes and steal the last bits of warmth from their bodies.
Hollow Man can rarely spawn from the Letum Frigus, if it is isolated enough. They are dangerous due to their invisibility.
TEXT.Spanish: Los Hombres Huecos aparecen raras veces cerca de Letum Frigus, si está lo suficientemente aislado. Son peligrosos debido a su invisibilidad.

TEXT.English: There are only seven of these beasts in Erebus, one for each of the parts Sucellus's body was broken into by Mulcarn. These creatures grow forever, reaching the size of a dragon in a few centuries. This is unlikely to occur because a phoenix's body parts are highly prized as magical components. Every phoenix has an egg and after the phoenix dies the broken shell reforms and the phoenix will be born anew the following morning. These eggs are jealously hidden and guarded by the Unblemished, a group of worshippers of Sucellus.
[TAB]Savages spawn in the wilderness, and can be a threat to your Melee units, if you don't force them into defensive combat.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]Los salvajes aparecen en las zonas salvajes, y pueden ser una amenaza para unidades Cuerpo a Cuerpo a menos que sean forzados a combatir de forma defensiva.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The Dybbuk are malicious spirits that can control the soul of someone who recently died. They have little power over the just, though those burdened with sin are easy prey for them. The Dybbuk can force the soul to possess a living or dead host.[NEWLINE][TAB]When a Dybbuk leaves a corrupted soul in the body of a dead host and the Dybbuk remains to strengthen and control the soul then the creature is known as a Wight. Wights are more powerful than ghouls and their touch steals the life and strength of their victim. Although Dybbuk prefer to not draw too much attention to themselves when threatened they can usually raise a group of ghouls lead by a wight to defend themselves.
Wights spawn from [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_BARROW]Barrows[\LINK] in Marshes, along with some [LINK=UNIT_GHOUL]Ghouls[\LINK].
